member.name: T:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo
member.summary: Represents the class that contains information about the devices connected to the system.
member.remarks: The information includes the bus number, chassis number, model, name, serial number, slot number, and socket number of the device connected to the system.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object, which can be used to open an instrument driver session for that device.
member.value: The name of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.Model
member.summary: Gets the model of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object.
member.value: The model of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.SerialNumber
member.summary: Gets the serial number of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object.
member.value: The serial number of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.SocketNumber
member.summary: Gets the socket number of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object.
member.value: The socket number of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.SlotNumber
member.summary: Gets the slot number of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object. This attribute can only be queried for PXI devices installed in a chassis that has been properly identified in Measurement Automation Explorer.
member.value: The slot number of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.ChassisNumber
member.summary: Gets the chassis number of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object. This attribute can only be queried for PXI devices installed in a chassis that has been properly identified in Measurement Automation Explorer.
member.value: The chassis number of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.DeviceInfo.BusNumber
member.summary: Gets the bus number of the device represented by the DeviceInfo object.
member.value: The bus number of the device connected to the system.
member.exception: The object that contained the DeviceInfo object has been disposed.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem
member.summary: Provides information about Modular Instrument devices connected to the system.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes an instance of
class.
member.remarks: The ModularInstrumentsSystem object obtained using the above constructor can be used to obtain information about all devices connected to the system.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Initializes an instance of
class.
member.remarks:
The ModularInstrumentsSystem object obtained using the above constructor can be used to obtain information about devices connected to the system that are supported by the device driver specified with the "deviceDriverName" parameter. For example:
To specify NI-SCOPE modular instrument device - "NI-SCOPE" or "niScope"
To specify NI-FGEN modular instrument device - "NI-FGEN" or "niFgen"
To specify NI-HSDIO modular instrument device - "NI-HSDIO" or "niHSDIO"
To specify NI-DMM modular instrument device - "NI-DMM" or "niDMM"
To specify NI-SWITCH modular instrument device - "NI-SWITCH" or "niSwitch"
To specify all NI modular instrument devices of any driver type - " " or "niModularInstrument"

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary:
Initializes an instance of
class.
member.remarks: The ModularInstrumentsSystem object obtained using the above constructor can be used to obtain information about devices connected to the system that are supported by the device driver. The device driver is specified by the .NET type of that device driver. For example, to specify the NI-SCOPE device driver, you must use the .NET type ScopeSession.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources that are held by .

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.ModularInstruments.SystemServices.DeviceServices.ModularInstrumentsSystem.DeviceCollection
member.summary: Gets the collection of DeviceInfo objects.
